entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023
